name: The Great Outdoors (Prototype)
description:
A small prototype based on the route from my old apartment to the train station and how the sounds and environment were overwhelming to my roommate who has anxiety and agoraphobia.

Created as a university project with the prompt "Voice."

Thank you for those who created the sound assets I used in the prototype.

Player's voice - myself

Marhian. (2011). mand_15dollarsshop [sound file]. https://freesound.org/people/martian/sounds/121133/
